content_parts.title: Stock cost adjustment for released item that is no longer in stock

content_parts.content: When a work order is closed for an item with FIFO or average cost valuation, any difference from the planned cost is balanced with an actual cost adjustment to increase or decrease the unit cost of the produced stock. When the current stock on hand is less than the produced quantity or is no longer in stock, the adjustment amount is recorded as a not absorbed cost and posted as a production variance on a journal entry.

content_parts.title: Required fields default to single record

content_parts.content: When there is only one possible value for a required field, that value is automatically selected. This can be a result of user permissions or when there is only one active record, like only one supplier or site. For example, if user permissions limit access to a single site when creating new documents, that site is automatically selected.
